rules_text: {3}, {T}: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a colorless card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text:
[i]“That aetherborn put forth three achievements that put our past year of work to shame. Send the Iken company to look into them.”
—Merana, Grand Artificier[/i]
